Text:
great series.. the true history of the world before the Tribulation, Armageddon, the biblical Millennium, and Eternity Future.

the denialists (who unfortunately comprise the majority of the world) whether of the ostrich sort (ignorant) or the intelligent, bribed sort (informed), who belittle the outworkings and machinations of the old/New World Order, will continue to take comfort in their blindness and mockeries, defending their owners and manipulators unto their unfortunate end of their lifelong enslavement.

The issue of the NWO is a broad subject involving creation, history, the purpose of history, bible prophecy, and God's brilliant plan for the world which will expose all the plans of Satan, fallen angels, and unsaved men as utter futilities and inevitable epic fails.
Do not be put off by the run time, this is excellent work.  Thanks to TheFuelProject and Torrent users and ThePIrateBay for making this available.  Absolutely brilliant.  Top stuff.
